description: Allows operators to record samples or rejects for defined material compositions during a packaging run, adjusting quantities up or down and optionally printing labels.
intent: Capture and classify sample and reject quantities, update running totals and recipe variables, and print labels if configured.
postconditions: Recipe variables for TotalSampled and TotalRejected updated
side_effects: May print labels for recorded samples or rejects
Writes data to MES and eSpec tables
example_usage: Operator selects 'Sample', chooses composition sequence 1, enters an adjusted quantity of 5, checks 'Print Label', and clicks Finish to record the samples.
